comment: I loved taking professor Poole's class. I took her in fall 2022 when it was her first semester teaching at Kennesaw State. She is amazing and genuinely cares about her students. She is always there to help. She assigns 3 papers throughout the semester, and you can write about whatever you want as long as you follow the criteria given. She is great!

She was amazing, and I would def recommend taking her. She didn't overload with work so you don't have to worry about being overwhelmed but I would recommend to participate because she cares about that. Other than that she is a young and caring professor.
She's average. You can tell she doesn't know what she's doing half the time but her class isn't hard. Wouldn't take her again cause there are better professors you can get more from.

I loved Professor Pooles class! She is young and a new professor but I definitely recommend her class. It was easy for me to write good essays because I got to write about stuff I enjoy. She is extremely caring and understanding. We got to debate about interesting topics too which was fun.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Caring--Graded by few things

comment: I genuinely enjoyed this class. The essays were fun to write and our class discussions were very interesting.
Professor Poole is an amazing teacher. She clearly shows through her teaching that she truly cares about what she talks about.

I loved Professor Poole! She's a new professor and she's young, so she is still figuring things out understandably. There are 3 essays and the prompts are mostly very free and flexible, which is good and bad. I sometimes didn't know exactly what she wanted us to write about, but she's also not a super harsh grader. She's very sweet and easy!

Ms Poole is a good teacher. She is very young so I think she has not found her groove yet, because sometimes you can tell she is winging it. But when she is on track she is very good. She is also very sweet and she wants everyone to do well. Take her class for and easy A and lectures that are either really fun or really easy to zone out of lol

Suzanna Poole is a great teacher; the workload is light, and lectures are more of a class discussion. There are the occasional discussion posts, but overall Shes a pretty chill teacher and has no problem with helping a student out when needed.
